title: Harlan Coben-The Best American Mystery Stories 2011-Epub, Mobi,
description:
Harlan Coben  - Best American Mystery Stories 2011

The excellent 15th edition of this "best of" series, edited by myster maven Otto Penzler, contains 20 winning short stories, many by relative unknowns.
